com.github.bordertech.wcomponents

Interface BeanTableDataModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BeanAware, BeanProviderBound, TableDataModel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanTableDataModel, SimpleBeanBoundTableDataModel
    Deprecated. 
    Use WTable and WTable.BeanBoundTableModel instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface BeanTableDataModel
extends TableDataModel, BeanProviderBound
    The BeanTableDataModel provides a link between a bean (bound to a table), and the table model API.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
